Articles.Content: You could, but it would be quite small. This is just taking the shuttle cargo bay and literally turning it sideways.

yes x-20 dynasoar

I started long time ago and need to finish.

also what should I do about first stage? I made a centaur from small pictures I found.

- snip -

If you're referring to the model you made in the picture, the thing you made is a Transtage, another upper stage created for Titan rockets. Centaur upper stages were used on Titan as well, but the part with the exposed, conical tanks next to the engines is a Transtage:

http://www.planet4589.org/space/misc/geo/transt.gif

Hope I could be helpful and clear up some possible confusion!

Edited September 24, 2015 by Budgie

The engine for the X-15 seems to be bugged, upon releasing it after selecting it I can't click on it to pick it back up, nor can I right click it to tweak it. I am not running RSS/RO.

- - - Updated - - -

I would also like to add (this is more of a suggestion), both the B52 and X-15 use the Mk2 cockpit interior. I understand that these mods are in their infancy, I would just like to see them receive their own interior.

The engine for the X-15 seems to be bugged, upon releasing it after selecting it I can't click on it to pick it back up, nor can I right click it to tweak it. I am not running RSS/RO.

- - - Updated - - -

I would also like to add (this is more of a suggestion), both the B52 and X-15 use the Mk2 cockpit interior. I understand that these mods are in their infancy, I would just like to see them receive their own interior.

Looks like I forgot to add colliders silly me. Still, all the things I shoot through unity I am bound to miss some of them. But thanks for letting me know.

Cockpits are very time consuming and will do them later

I am glad america chose the shuttle and not that. Would be a funny national icon. But I would like to make it still. Looks interesting

- - - Updated - - -

Mike,

This is amazing. Always wanted to fly a Farscape and an X-20. If there's ever a Kerbal-con or something, I'm gonna buy you a whole plate of NC BBQ. John Crichton forever!

BTW, the screenshot you posted of him with the long beard laying on the module was from a season 1 episode called Jeremiah Crichton, which is, quite literally, the worst of the 88 episodes.

Still, even a bad Farscape episode is better than a lot of other TV.

John Crichton was here!

Im honoured. I would love to be at a kerbalcon and meet the big guys there.

Thanks for the info and I will have to check out this series. Maybe I can watch while I mod

- - - Updated - - -

Nice Mike!

Why not just use FASA's Titan parts as LV, and just make the adapter which connects the shuttle to the rocket? Would mean less work...

Also, you should apply an Edgesplit modifier to the models shown above, they look a bit "liquid" right now.

Will have to install fasa again and make it all fit thanks. Will try edgesplit also

haha this made me laugh. elevator music. so good for a video
High ISP and high thrust ( the thrust should preferably have at least a twr of .7 or higher.

ok I made a 'drive' engine.

so you have your normal one running on lfo and another unit you install into the ship with a thrust transform with super high isp and thrust, runs on magic xenon gas for now

you can switch between engines.

screenshots in a minute
Awesome!

Awesome! Thanks! Can't wait to take it for a spin!

so while mowing the lawns, thinking about the finer details of the aerodynamic properties of control surfaces in the vacuum of space, I figured I should add invisible control surfaces built into the wings of the farscape.

no visual differences, no extra parts, functionality.

working on the Eyes Turned Skywards mod and inputting first Part:

Apollo block iii - basic textures for now

Javascript is disabled. View full album
On the farscape, things are looking good! It definitely needs control surfaces, and the extra engine, the red one, has collision boxes that extend outside of the craft, and cause it to explode.

working on the Eyes Turned Skywards mod and inputting first Part:

Apollo block iii - basic textures for now

-snip-

Guess I never made a public announcement. I'll be helping Mike run an Eyes Turned Skywards mod. I don't claim any credit for any management skills or something like that. Just running the page and maybe doing some testing. Expect a thread soon, maybe when we have something deliverable!
